query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  uniqueId, 
  title, 
  templateStatus,
  isPublic,
  documentRequired,
  LENGTH(superpromptContent) as superprompt_length,
  LENGTH(variablesSchema) as variables_length,
  SUBSTRING(superpromptContent, 1, 200) as superprompt_preview,
  SUBSTRING(variablesSchema, 1, 500) as variables_preview
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
   OR title = 'Vertrag prüfen'
ORDER BY uniqueId;
